thread.title: A Pop Tarts café just opened — here’s where you can sample the sweet goods
thread.title_full: A Pop Tarts café just opened — here’s where you can sample the sweet goods

author: Kenya Foy
title: A Pop Tarts café just opened — here’s where you can sample the sweet goods
text:
A Pop Tarts café just opened — here’s where you can sample the sweet goods Has your sweet tooth radar detected a sudden increase in the availability of sugary foods? If so, that *might* have something to do with the fact that there’s a Pop Tarts café in New York City . According to Forbes , Kellogg’s NYC — the upscale cereal-only restaurant — has undergone a temporary Pop Tarts makeover for the week of February 21 for those of you are more interested in sharing sweet snacks with a special someone rather than joining your date at a cereal bar .
Not that there’s anything wrong with making kissy faces over a bowl of fancy Frosted Flakes, but it’s nice to have to options, ya know? Anyway, the city that never sleeps is making sure absolutely no one gets any shut-eye around those parts. This Pop Tarts menu is the fastest route to a sugar high, if getting hyped up on a ton of ridiculously sweet toaster treats sounds like your idea of fun.
Aaand it should, because holey moly, get a load of all this YUM: Pop-Tarts milkshakes, burritos, and pizza? Yes. This is happening. Pop-Tarts Café is taking over @kelloggsnyc Times Square this week! #PopTartsCafe 
A post shared by Pop-Tarts (@poptartsus) on Feb 21, 2017 at 6:59am PST 
At $1 a pop, patrons can choose from 20 Pop Tarts flavors, or they can go the adventurous route by sampling some of the more, er, innovative menu items. For example, $12 will get you a serving of Pop Tarts burritos with a side of kiwi salsa and frosting “sour cream.”
Poptart Burrito: strawberry frosted poptart w/ fresh strawbs & choco chips wrapped in a tortilla (crepe), with salsas (berries & kiwis) and sour cream (frosting). My eyes are confused but my tastebuds are happy #NOM #nyc #snackz #poptartpopup 
A post shared by AMC (@heyyandrea) on Feb 21, 2017 at 12:55pm PST 
Or perhaps you’re more interested in Birthday Fiesta Nachos (seriously), a $9 item that consists of confetti cupcake Pop-Tarts, with frosting “cheese” and strawberry “salsa,” and ugh, we feel a stomach ache coming on from just looking at this gloriously sweet spread:
Say hello to the #poptarts pop up cafe in Times Square! Fresh out of the toaster today until Sunday Feb 26 at Kellogg's NYC. Check it out! #poptartscafe #nyc #timessquare 
A post shared by Jennifer Lahmers (@jennlahmers) on Feb 21, 2017 at 4:52pm PST 
For college students who can’t make it to the restaurant, Pop Tarts will partner with UberEats on Friday, February 24 from 8-10 pm to spread the love in the form of 600 free Pop Tarts burritos, which will be given out during a foodie-themed campus crawl of sorts at six New York City colleges.
